function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of air pollutants during lockdown period","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and other health issues","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict air quality regulations and monitoring, reduction of industrial emissions","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technologies","People":"Residents, commuters, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Unequal impact of traffic emission reductions","Impact":"Unequal distribution of health benefits and environmental improvement","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of clean transportation infrastructure and initiatives, targeted policies for affected communities","Technologies":"Electric vehicles, public transportation, urban planning for pedestrian and cyclist-friendly spaces","People":"Communities in cities with limited traffic emission reductions","Owner":"Local governments, transportation authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Limited reduction in PM concentration in some cities","Impact":"Persistent air pollution and associated health risks","Mitigation":"Identification and regulation of non-transportation sources of air pollution, incentivizing cleaner heating technologies","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, clean energy solutions","People":"Residents and workers in cities with high PM concentration","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local governments, and community organizations"}]}
